alert.note: Alert for Coastal Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 04 at 12:04PM CST until February 05 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Willacy County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
